column2: Cars.com, Inc. engages in the provision of automotive products and services through online automotive classifieds. The company is headquartered in Chicago, Illinois and currently employs 1,400 full-time employees. Cars.com is an online research destination for car shoppers. The firm is engaged in the sale of online subscription advertising products targeting car dealerships. The company offers a suite of products and services targeting the automotive needs of its buyer and seller customers. Cars.com offers a digital automotive marketplace search engine that helps car buyers to make informed purchasing decisions and helps sellers to engage with a portion of their target customer base. This online automotive marketplace service connects buyers and sellers across five Websites: Cars.com, Auto.com, DealerRater.com, NewCars.com and PickupTrucks.com. Its automotive marketplace products also include credible user and automotive and dealer reviews. The company is also engaged in the sale of display advertising to national advertisers. Car buyers and car owners interface with Cars.com primarily through the Cars.com sites and mobile applications.
